content.p: Associate Professor, Lawal has background in GIS and geomatics engineering. He has taught is related subjects that include geographical information systems, remote sensing; geospatial engineering and water resources. He has extensive experience in the applications of geospatial sciences and technologies in Geo-science environment; hydro-informatics and urban environments. Course Convener: Introduction to Geographic Information Systems ; Earth Observation; & Global Environmental Processes .
